body: You actually seem to do more damage when frantically trying to avoid your enemies.
name: Surprise Strike
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Feats/Surprise Strike

sections.body: Cautious Fighter, Desperate Swing, base attack bonus +6, halfling.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Once per day, when fighting defensively or making an attack of opportunity while taking the total defense action with the Desperate Swing feat, you take no penalty on the attack roll.
sections.name: Benefit
